oai_dc:dc.dc:title: AN AUTOMATED MEASURING SYSTEM TO REGISTRATE AND BALANCE SUSPENDED SEDIMENT AND ASSOCIATED PARAMETERS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Neumann, Lothar J.R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: suspended sediment
automated measuring system
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The automated measuring system Oortkaten (AMO) was established in order to determine the balance of suspended sediment and associated parameters. Morphological and velocity weighted averaged samples are taken using the newly developed MOSTRA-Method. This results in a cross-sectional average value.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 20 (1986): Proceedings of 20th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Taipei, Taiwan, 1986.; 104
